availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Herbert (Kenton County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Powers Herbert in Kenton County, Kentucky, on November 16, 1840. Father of Angeline Herbert, Sarah A. Herbert, and Henry C. Herbert. Drayman in Covington, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, p. 277B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p. 383.
Northern Kentucky Marriages, 1795-1850, Ancestry, Kenton County, Kentucky, 1840.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Campbell County Administrators Bonds, 1874-1894, p. 83.
